properties.heading: UK Floods - North England and East Midlands
properties.copy: The north of England and East Midlands experiences severe rainfall and flooding over recent days, with Sheffield and Doncaster particularly affected, as well as nearby towns and villages.

properties.heading: Times Square New Year's Eve
properties.copy: Times Square in New York City hosts one of the world's most iconic New Year's Eve celebrations with a giant ball drop and fireworks.

properties.heading: Cherry Blossom Festival
properties.copy: Tokyo's Cherry Blossom Festival, or Hanami, is a time when people enjoy picnics under the blooming cherry blossoms.

properties.heading: Sydney Opera House
properties.copy: The Sydney Opera House is an architectural masterpiece and a world-renowned cultural venue on Sydney Harbour.

properties.heading: Carnival in Rio
properties.copy: The Carnival in Rio de Janeiro is famous for its vibrant samba parades, music, and colorful costumes.

properties.heading: Pyramids of Giza
properties.copy: The Pyramids of Giza are among the last standing wonders of the ancient world, showcasing Egypt's rich history.

properties.heading: Machu Picchu Ruins
properties.copy: Machu Picchu is an ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, known for its archaeological significance.

properties.heading: Table Mountain
properties.copy: Table Mountain in Cape Town is a distinctive flat-topped mountain offering stunning views of the city and coastline.

properties.heading: Seoul Lantern Festival
properties.copy: The Seoul Lantern Festival features beautifully illuminated lantern displays along the Cheonggyecheon Stream.

properties.heading: Jardin Majorelle
properties.copy: Jardin Majorelle is a tranquil and exotic garden in Marrakech, known for its blue-painted buildings and lush plants.

properties.heading: Ubud Monkey Forest
properties.copy: The Ubud Monkey Forest is a sanctuary where visitors can observe and interact with playful macaques.

properties.heading: Jardin Majorelle
properties.copy: Jardin Majorelle is a tranquil and exotic garden in Marrakech, known for its blue-painted buildings and lush plants.

properties.heading: Burj Khalifa
properties.copy: The Burj Khalifa is the world's tallest skyscraper, offering breathtaking views of Dubai's skyline.

properties.heading: Santorini Sunset
properties.copy: Santorini offers one of the world's most breathtaking sunsets, attracting visitors to witness its beauty.

properties.heading: Angkor Wat
properties.copy: Angkor Wat is a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of the most important archaeological sites in Southeast Asia.

properties.heading: Stanley Park
properties.copy: Stanley Park in Vancouver is a beloved urban park offering scenic views, trails, and attractions.

properties.heading: Antelope Canyon
properties.copy: Antelope Canyon in Arizona is a mesmerizing slot canyon known for its stunning play of light and shadow.
